headline: Sakrete Celebrates 90-Year Legacy at World of Concrete 2026
summary: Sakrete, the original bagged concrete mix brand, will kick off the celebration of its 90th anniversary serving the building and construction industries at World of Concrete 2026, January 20â€“22, in Las Vegas, Nevada. This milestone event will feature an all-new, immersive booth experience alongside sister brand Amerimix. It will also feature exclusive anniversary activations, including the debut of Sakrete's new workwear line, launching live at the show.
